sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The bishop of London, the Welsh curate, and common prayers, with apocrypha in the end. By Will. Erbery. Erbery, William, 1604-1654.
[4], 8, [2], 16, [2], 11, [3], 6 p.
[s.n.], Printed at London, : 1652 [i.e. 1653]
Includes 'The general epistle to the Hebrews', with its own separate titlepage. 'The bishop of London', 'The Welsh curate', and 'Apocrypha' has its own titlpage. Register is continuous. Annotation on Thomason copy: "8th January". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[4], 8, [2], 16, [2], 11, [3], 6 p.
[s.n.], Printed at London, : 1652 [i.e. 1653]
Includes 'The general epistle to the Hebrews', with its own separate titlepage. 'The bishop of London', 'The Welsh curate', and 'Apocrypha' has its own titlpage. Register is continuous. Annotation on Thomason copy: "8th January". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
